skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill, you can easily control your KNX Smart Home by voice.

Requirements:
- A PEAKnx touch panel or USB-Connector with YOUVI software installed and the YOUVI Connect module.
- Ready-to-use YOUVI visualisation (ETS project already imported)
- Activation of a YOUVI IoT account

Installation/Setup:
- Install the YOUVI Connect module via YOUVI Dashboard.
- Create an IoT account in YOUVI Configuration > Modules > Connect.
- Activate the skill in the Alexa app and log in with your YOUVI IoT account.
- Say "Alexa, discover my new devices". You will then receive a message about how many devices have been found by Alexa.

Now to control your Smart Home with Alexa, say for example:
- Alexa, set RGB light living room* to red.
- Alexa, open the kitchen roller shutter.
- Alexa, dim the bathroom light to 30%.

*The device name matches the device name of the visualisation.
More information about the PEAKnx devices and YOUVI can be found at www.peaknx.com.
